scripts.dev-next: concurrently "cd server && npm run start:dev" "cd next-client && npm run dev"
scripts.dev-vue: concurrently "cd server && npm run start:dev" "cd vue-client && npm run dev"
scripts.dev-ng: concurrently "cd server && npm run start:dev" "cd ng-client && npm run start"
scripts.install: concurrently "cd server && npm install" "cd client && npm install"
